H0.text: Unicellular is the human brain, which is an organ that is made up of many tissues.

H1.text: Multicellular is the human brain, as it is an organ composed of many tissues.

H2.text: Part of a bacterial colony is the human brain, an organ made up of many tissues.

H3.text: Able to function independently is the property of the human brain, which is an organ composed of many tissues.

A4.text: The human brain is primarily composed of neurons, glial cells, neural stem cells, and blood vessels.

A5.text: The human brain is an organ composed of many tissues.
